std_change_template.name: HSDP STD template
std_change_template.template:
short_description=Include a title for your change no greater than 100 characters. xxxx^description=Describe what you plan to do. xxxxx^implementation_plan=List the steps in order of completion that will be worked through when implementing this change.
Note who will perform each step and whether there are dependencies between steps. xxxx^backout_plan=Describe the steps you will take to revert the change to its pre-implementation state. xxx
At what point during the implementation will you take the decision to backout your change?
Does your change window include time to backout if you need to?^test_plan=Explain what testing you have done or will do prior to implementation that gives you confidence this change will be successful. xxxx
Describe the tests that will be carried out after implementation to confirm that the change has been successful.^justification=hsdp^reason=Other^EQ
